issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
1. Publish an app for the Android marketplace
2. Click on the link for Keystore Information	

h3. Actual Result
Broken link

h3. Expected Result
Takes you to a page that describes how to get your own keys

comments.body:
The bug is fixed in Studio 2.1.0

When clicking on the 'Distribute - Android App Store' button, the 'Keystore Information' now points to the correct URL:

http://developer.android.com/tools/publishing/app-signing.html#cert
